alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN CASS AND NORTHWESTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leader, or 18 miles northwest of Brainerd, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breezy Point, Pequot Lakes, Crosslake, Nisswa, Pine River, Leader, Gull Lake, Merrifield, Lake Shore, East Gull Lake, Jenkins, Chickamaw Beach, Lower Hay Lake, North Long Lake, Upper Mission Lake, Lake Hubert, Edward Lake, Casino, Lower Mission Lake, and Lower Whitefish Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
